marketplaces.name: ClaudeAutoPM Framework
marketplaces.description: Autonomous Project Management Framework - Advanced AI-powered development automation with 53 agents, 112 commands, and comprehensive DevOps integration
marketplaces.repo_description: Autonomous Project Management Framework for Claude Code - Advanced AI-powered development automation

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "ClaudeAutoPM Framework",
  "description": "Autonomous Project Management Framework - Advanced AI-powered development automation with 53 agents, 112 commands, and comprehensive DevOps integration",
  "version": "1.30.0",
  "owner": {
    "name": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
    "email": "autopm@example.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM",
  "repository": "https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM",
  "license": "MIT",
  "pluginRoot": "./plugins",
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "core-agents",
      "source": "./plugins/core-agents",
      "description": "Essential AI agents: agent-manager, code-analyzer, file-analyzer, test-runner",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Core",
      "keywords": ["agents", "core", "analysis", "testing"],
      "agents": [
        "@agent-manager",
        "@code-analyzer",
        "@file-analyzer",
        "@test-runner"
      ],
      "commands": [],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "devops-suite",
      "source": "./plugins/devops-suite",
      "description": "Complete DevOps automation: Docker, GitHub, Azure DevOps, SSH operations, observability",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "DevOps",
      "keywords": ["devops", "automation", "ci-cd", "docker", "github"],
      "agents": [
        "@docker-containerization-expert",
        "@github-operations-specialist",
        "@azure-devops-specialist",
        "@ssh-operations-expert",
        "@observability-engineer",
        "@traefik-proxy-expert",
        "@mcp-context-manager"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/devops:docker-build",
        "/devops:ci-setup",
        "/devops:deploy"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit-ci", "post-deploy"],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "cloud-architects",
      "source": "./plugins/cloud-architects",
      "description": "Multi-cloud architecture: AWS, Azure, GCP specialists with IaC expertise",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Cloud",
      "keywords": ["cloud", "aws", "azure", "gcp", "infrastructure", "terraform"],
      "agents": [
        "@aws-cloud-architect",
        "@azure-cloud-architect",
        "@gcp-cloud-architect",
        "@terraform-infrastructure-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/cloud:provision",
        "/cloud:optimize",
        "/cloud:migrate"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "database-experts",
      "source": "./plugins/database-experts",
      "description": "Database specialists: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, BigQuery, CosmosDB",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Databases",
      "keywords": ["database", "sql", "nosql", "postgresql", "mongodb", "redis"],
      "agents": [
        "@postgresql-expert",
        "@mongodb-expert",
        "@redis-expert",
        "@bigquery-expert",
        "@cosmosdb-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/db:optimize",
        "/db:migrate",
        "/db:backup"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "testing-framework",
      "source": "./plugins/testing-framework",
      "description": "Comprehensive testing: E2E, TDD, performance, security testing with multiple frameworks",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Testing",
      "keywords": ["testing", "e2e", "tdd", "playwright", "cypress", "jest"],
      "agents": [
        "@e2e-test-engineer",
        "@tdd-specialist",
        "@performance-testing-expert",
        "@security-testing-specialist"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/test:e2e",
        "/test:unit",
        "/test:coverage",
        "/test:security"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit-test", "pre-push-test"],
      "mcpServers": ["playwright"]
    },
    {
      "name": "pm-commands",
      "source": "./plugins/pm-commands",
      "description": "Project Management workflows: Epic decomposition, task management, release planning",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Project Management",
      "keywords": ["project-management", "agile", "scrum", "planning", "workflow"],
      "agents": [
        "@project-manager",
        "@agile-coach"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/pm:epic-decompose",
        "/pm:sprint-plan",
        "/pm:release",
        "/pm:validate",
        "/pm:optimize"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-release"],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "azure-devops",
      "source": "./plugins/azure-devops",
      "description": "Complete Azure DevOps integration: Boards, Repos, Pipelines, Artifacts",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Azure",
      "keywords": ["azure", "devops", "boards", "pipelines", "repos"],
      "agents": [
        "@azure-devops-specialist",
        "@azure-boards-manager"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/azure:work-item-create",
        "/azure:epic-decompose",
        "/azure:pipeline-run",
        "/azure:pr-create"
      ],
      "hooks": ["azure-sync"],
      "mcpServers": ["azure-devops"]
    },
    {
      "name": "github-automation",
      "source": "./plugins/github-automation",
      "description": "GitHub workflow automation: Actions, releases, PR management",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "GitHub",
      "keywords": ["github", "actions", "ci-cd", "automation", "workflow"],
      "agents": [
        "@github-operations-specialist"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/github:release",
        "/github:pr-create",
        "/github:action-create"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit", "pre-push"],
      "mcpServers": ["github"]
    },
    {
      "name": "language-specialists",
      "source": "./plugins/language-specialists",
      "description": "Language experts: Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Bash scripting",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Languages",
      "keywords": ["nodejs", "javascript", "typescript", "python", "bash"],
      "agents": [
        "@nodejs-backend-engineer",
        "@javascript-frontend-engineer",
        "@typescript-specialist",
        "@python-backend-engineer",
        "@bash-scripting-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "framework-specialists",
      "source": "./plugins/framework-specialists",
      "description": "Framework experts: React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, Django, FastAPI",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Frameworks",
      "keywords": ["react", "vue", "angular", "nextjs", "django", "fastapi"],
      "agents": [
        "@react-specialist",
        "@vue-specialist",
        "@angular-specialist",
        "@nextjs-expert",
        "@django-expert",
        "@fastapi-expert"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/framework:scaffold",
        "/framework:optimize"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "data-engineering",
      "source": "./plugins/data-engineering",
      "description": "Data engineering: ETL pipelines, data modeling, analytics",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Data",
      "keywords": ["data", "etl", "analytics", "pipelines", "modeling"],
      "agents": [
        "@data-engineer",
        "@etl-specialist"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/data:pipeline-create",
        "/data:model-design"
      ],
      "hooks": [],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "security-auditing",
      "source": "./plugins/security-auditing",
      "description": "Security tools: Code auditing, vulnerability scanning, compliance checks",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Security",
      "keywords": ["security", "audit", "vulnerability", "compliance", "scanning"],
      "agents": [
        "@security-testing-specialist",
        "@security-auditor"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "/security:audit",
        "/security:scan",
        "/security:compliance"
      ],
      "hooks": ["pre-commit-security"],
      "mcpServers": []
    },
    {
      "name": "full-framework",
      "source": "./plugins/full-framework",
      "description": "Complete ClaudeAutoPM framework - all 53 agents, 112 commands, all features",
      "version": "1.30.0",
      "author": "ClaudeAutoPM Team",
      "category": "Complete",
      "keywords": ["all", "complete", "framework", "full-stack"],
      "agents": ["*"],
      "commands": ["*"],
      "hooks": ["*"],
      "mcpServers": ["*"],
      "dependencies": [
        "core-agents",
        "devops-suite",
        "cloud-architects",
        "database-experts",
        "testing-framework",
        "pm-commands",
        "azure-devops",
        "github-automation",
        "language-specialists",
        "framework-specialists",
        "data-engineering",
        "security-auditing"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
files.README.md:
# ClaudeAutoPM [![NPM Version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/claude-autopm)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-autopm) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/claude-autopm)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-autopm) [![MIT License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-28a745)](LICENSE) [![GitHub Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM?style=social)](https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM) **AI-Powered Project Management Framework for Claude Code** ClaudeAutoPM transforms your development workflow with intelligent automation, 60+ specialized AI agents, and complete GitHub/Azure DevOps integration. --- ## Quick Install ```bash npm install -g claude-autopm cd your-project autopm install ``` Choose your scenario during installation: - **Minimal** - Core features, 3 plugins - **Docker-only** - Modern web development, 6 plugins - **Full DevOps** - Production-ready, 9 plugins (recommended) - **Performance** - All capabilities, 11 plugins --- ## Quick Start All commands run inside Claude Code (not terminal): ```bash # Initialize PM structure /pm:init # Create and decompose a feature /pm:prd-new "User authentication system" /pm:prd-parse user-authentication /pm:epic-decompose user-authentication # Work on tasks /pm:next /pm:issue-start 1 /pm:issue-close 1 # Sync with GitHub/Azure DevOps /pm:epic-sync user-authentication ``` --- ## Features ### Plugin System 11 official plugins with 60+ specialized agents: - **Core** - Framework essentials, code analyzer, test runner - **Languages** - JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Node.js, Bash - **Frameworks** - React, Vue, Tailwind CSS - **Testing** - E2E, frontend testing, accessibility - **DevOps** - Docker, GitHub Actions, observability - **Cloud** - AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, Terraform - **Databases** - PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, BigQuery - **PM** - 87 project management commands ### Provider Integration - **GitHub** - Issues, PRs, Actions, Projects - **Azure DevOps** - Work Items, Boards, Pipelines - **Local** - Git-based workflow ### Execution Strategies - **Sequential** - Safe, predictable, resource-light - **Adaptive** - Intelligent mode selection (default) - **Hybrid** - Maximum parallelization --- ## Documentation ### Getting Started - [Installation](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/getting-started/installation) - [First Project](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/getting-started/first-project) - [Configuration](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/getting-started/configuration) ### User Guide - [PM Workflow](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/user-guide/pm-workflow) - [Commands Overview](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/user-guide/commands-overview) - [Agents Overview](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/user-guide/agents-overview) - [MCP Servers](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/user-guide/mcp-servers) - [Best Practices](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/user-guide/best-practices) ### Developer Guide - [Architecture](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/developer-guide/architecture) - [Plugin Development](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/developer-guide/plugin-development) - [Agent Development](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/developer-guide/agent-development) - [Command Development](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/developer-guide/command-development) - [Testing](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/developer-guide/testing) - [Contributing](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/developer-guide/contributing) ### Reference - [CLI Reference](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/commands/) - [Agent Registry](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/agents/) - [Configuration Options](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/reference/configuration) - [Troubleshooting](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/reference/troubleshooting) --- ## Why ClaudeAutoPM? | Feature | ClaudeAutoPM | Traditional Tools | |---------|--------------|-------------------| | AI-native | Built for Claude Code | Adapted/retrofitted | | Modular | 11 plugins, install what you need | Monolithic | | Agents | 60+ specialized experts | Generic or none | | Workflow | PRD to Production | Fragmented | | Integration | GitHub + Azure DevOps | Limited | --- ## Contributing We welcome contributions! See the [Contributing Guide](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/developer-guide/contributing) for: - Development setup - Coding standards - Testing requirements - Pull request process --- ## License MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details. --- ## Links - **Documentation**: [rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM](https://rafeekpro.github.io/ClaudeAutoPM/) - **npm**: [npmjs.com/package/claude-autopm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-autopm) - **Issues**: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM/issues) - **Discussions**: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/rafeekpro/ClaudeAutoPM/discussions) - **Changelog**: [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) ---

Built for the Claude Code community
Star this repo if ClaudeAutoPM helps your workflow!
